Question: In 1723, at the age of 17, this person proposed to 15-year-old Deborah Read while a boarder in the Read home.
Hints: This person became involved in Philadelphia politics and rapidly progressed.
This person is known to have played the violin, the harp, and the guitar.
Daylight saving time (DST) is often erroneously attributed to a 1784 satire that this person published anonymously.
